div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 679 Rodina, c. 18 km. E of Veliko Târnovo, Bulgaria, 1964 Burial: 1st cent. B.C. (T) Contents: many AR. Pot hoard Maroneia: 5 spread-flan tetradr. Roman Rep.: 50 den. (1st cent. B.C.) Disposition: Veliko Târnovo 55 Gerasimov, BIAB 29 (1966), p. 213
